Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to providing an additional ten percent credit on qualified labor expenses under the empire state film production and post production credits in Nassau and Suffolk counties
Summary: Provides an additional ten percent credit on qualified labor expenses under the empire state film production credit and empire state film post production credit in Nassau and Suffolk counties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing an additional ten percent credit on qualified labor expenses under the empire state film production credit and empire state film post production credit in Nassau and Suffolk counties
